snippet: The newly acquired Thomas Vanek had a goal and an assist to reach 500 points in his career and lead the Islanders past Boston.
abstract: NHL Roundup; New York Islanders defeat Boston Bruins, 3-1; other scores noted.
lead_paragraph: The newly acquired Thomas Vanek had a goal and an assist to reach 500 points in his career and lead the Islanders past Boston.

headline.main: Vanek Reaches Milestone as Islanders Defeat Bruins
headline.print_headline: Vanek Reaches Milestone As Islanders Defeat Bruins
